author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Implement additional framework functionality used by the MPI-based modules developed in #32632:
  - `edm::GenericProduct` can be used to produce any collection using its ROOT dictionary;
  - `edmtest::GenericCloner` will clone all the event products declared by its configuration, using their ROOT dictionaries.

Implement integration tests for the `post_insert()` functionality, both using the regular `Event::put()`/`emplace()` methods and via a `GenericProduct`.

Extend few core features:
  - `edm::ObjectWithDict::objectCast()` now returns by reference or const reference instead of by value;
  - `edm::Wrapper<T>` can be populated moving from an object using a type-erased `void*` and the object's `std::type_info`; `edm::WrapperBase` provides the `moveFrom()` public interface.

`GenericCloner` can be used to test the ROOT serialisation and deserialisation code.

`GenericConsumer` is refactored to make use of the new common functionality.

#### PR validation:

New unit test pass.
title: Implement a `GenericProduct` and `GenericCloner` test module
